reviewText: I used this in my classroom when I was a teacher. It is so much fun to watch and so informative. If you live in North Carolina it is a must!
A must for every North Carolinian

From one Native North Carolinian , to any others ! This is a MUST have item ! Am so,happy to find it , I have been looking
  For years !!! Charles Kuralt was a much loved artist ,Journalist. And Multiple prize winning Author .Often funny but he speakers  to echoes of your soul. If you are fortunate
Enough to be from "our " State :) . If not the entertainment alone will capture ,all who enjoy learning non fiction information about our country . Easy to have
Converted to DVD , my favorite purchase from Amazon .com !!! Sandra Davidson.
I received my order much more quickly than expected and the video was in excellent condition as promised.
